channel.title: chatgpt TikTok
channel.description: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from chatgpt

item.title: Study mode in ChatGPT helps foster deeper learning by guiding you through the problem instead of just giving you the answer. Available for logged-in Free, Plus, Pro, and Team users—just tap the + button and select study mode!
item.description: Study mode in ChatGPT helps foster deeper learning by guiding you through the problem instead of just giving you the answer. Available for logged-in Free, Plus, Pro, and Team users—just tap the + button and select study mode!

item.title: We asked college student Yogya Kalra for his honest thoughts on Study Mode. Have you tried it yet? → Open a new chat. Press the ➕ icon in the chat box. Choose 'Study and learn'. Go wild.

item.title: “You’re sleeping on GPT, babe.” 🎥: @AI with Tiff Tiff is dedicated to making AI simple and useful for everyone. She creates content that helps people integrate AI into their daily lives and businesses so it’s actually practical, not overwhelming.

item.title: Everyone can ask for images like these in ChatGPT—just try this chat: ➡️ Show me a highly detailed image of miniature people [insert task/details]

item.title: Say hello to personalities in ChatGPT—a setting that allows you to choose between 5 different personalities for Chat to assume when talking to you. 1️⃣ Default - Cheerful and adaptive 2️⃣ Cynic - Critical and sarcastic 3️⃣ Robot - Efficient and blunt 4️⃣
item.description: Say hello to personalities in ChatGPT—a setting that allows you to choose between 5 different personalities for Chat to assume when talking to you. 1️⃣ Default - Cheerful and adaptive 2️⃣ Cynic - Critical and sarcastic 3️⃣ Robot - Efficient and blunt 4️⃣

item.title: Look ma, I’m coding! Just ask ChatGPT to build you games, web apps, or sites in canvas—then just go into the canvas and click Run Code in the top right! Available to all users on the web in GPT-5.
item.description: Look ma, I’m coding! Just ask ChatGPT to build you games, web apps, or sites in canvas—then just go into the canvas and click Run Code in the top right! Available to all users on the web in GPT-5.

item.title: Projects in ChatGPT are now available to Free users! Whether it’s upping your Fantasy Football game or keeping your budgeting files and chats in one place, projects can help you organize your chats to keep momentum on the subjects most important to you.

item.title: Say hello to study mode—a learning experience in ChatGPT that helps you work through problems step-by-step instead of just getting an answer. Study mode in ChatGPT was designed in collaboration with educators and experts to be interactive, using Socratic
